title: Network Infrastructure Lead

company.name: Nexdecade Technology (Pvt.) Ltd.
company.description: Leading value added service provider in Bangladesh. We are working with all mobile telecom operators for more than 12 years with different services. Currently managing more than 20 million customers; pioneers in development for OTT / IPTV / IOT platform in Bangladesh. Licensed operator from BTRC.

jobContext: We are seeking a highly skilled Network Infrastructure Lead with deep expertise in Linux systems to manage, design, and maintain our distributed network infrastructure and storage systems.

NetworkDesignDeployment: Lead the design and deployment of distributed network infrastructure, focusing on routing, switching, and storage integration.
Seamlessly integrate the network with multiple IIGs and efficiently manage the data path.
Troubleshoot complex network issues involving routing, switching, storage, and application layers.
NetworkStorageManagement: Expert-level management of Linux systems for networking, storage, and security services.
Deploy, configure, and manage NFS storage servers and mount storage endpoints.
Manage network configurations using Cisco SDN, including F5 Load Balancer and NGINX web server environments for high availability.
Implement advanced Linux kernel tuning and network stack optimizations to ensure maximum performance and security.
LinuxExpertise: Oversee and manage Linux-based network infrastructure, including firewalls, DNS, DHCP, and high-performance web servers.
Utilize Bash scripting and automation tools (e.g., Ansible, Puppet) to streamline network and server configuration management.
Perform Linux-based security hardening, including SELinux/AppArmor configuration, firewall rules, and system monitoring.
Analyze and troubleshoot Linux server performance issues using tools like iostat, vmstat, netstat, and tcpdump for advanced diagnostics.
OTTStreamingInfrastructure: Design, deploy, and manage OTT streaming infrastructure, ensuring efficient operation of streaming applications such as Wowza, Nimble, Transcoder, and MUX.
Oversee transcoding workflows and optimize streaming systems for performance, scalability, and fault tolerance.
Integrate streaming infrastructure with Linux systems for content distribution, media processing, and secure delivery.
ContainerizationOrchestration: Deploy and manage containerized applications using Docker.
Implement and manage Kubernetes for container orchestration, ensuring scalable and resilient deployment of network and streaming services.
Maintain secure and efficient Linux-based container environments, optimizing resource utilization and network traffic within the Kubernetes clusters.
CollaborationReporting: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including software development and operations, to ensure the integration of network, storage, and Linux-based infrastructure with project requirements.
Provide detailed reports on system performance, storage utilization, network issues, and infrastructure optimizations.

additionalRequirements: Proven expertise in Linux system administration, including network services, storage management, and security.
Deep understanding of routing and switching protocols and deployment in distributed environments.
Hands-on experience with NFS storage server configuration, deployment, and management.
Strong knowledge of Cisco SDN network management, F5 Load Balancer, and NGINX web server configuration.
Proficiency in managing and optimizing OTT streaming infrastructure with applications like Wowza, Nimble, Zixi, and others.
Hands-on experience with MUX and Transcoder configuration and management for live TV channel streaming.
Strong background in Docker and Kubernetes, with hands-on experience deploying containerized applications.
Advanced troubleshooting skills using Linux-based diagnostic tools like tcpdump, iptables, iostat, netstat, and strace.
Expertise in Linux kernel tuning, system optimizations, and performance analysis.
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines, with experience automating Linux systems using Ansible, Puppet, or Chef.
Experience with streaming infrastructure scaling in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, or Azure).
Knowledge of Kubernetes cluster management and Docker security best practices.
Strong understanding of firewalls, VPNs, and network security in Linux environments.
educationalRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience)
experienceRequirements: 10 years of experience in network infrastructure management.
